description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国广东省下辖的地级市，是粤港澳大湾区的重要节点城市，国家历史文化名城，全国重要的制造业基地。
description.en: A prefecture-level city in Guangdong Province, People's Republic of China. It is an important node city in the Guangdong-Hong Kong-Macao Greater Bay Area, a national historical and cultural city, and a major manufacturing base in China.

description.en: Chinese politician, former Secretary of the Foshan Municipal Committee of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 东晋时期来自罽宾（今克什米尔）的三藏法师，最早将佛教带到佛山地区。
description.en: A Tripiṭaka master from Jibin (modern Kashmir) during the Eastern Jin dynasty, who was the first to bring Buddhism to the Foshan area.

description.zh-cn: 世界三大宗教之一。
description.en: One of the three major world religions.

description.zh-cn: 明朝佛山乡绅，曾组织地方武装镇压农民起义。
description.en: A local gentleman of Foshan during the Ming dynasty, who organized local armed forces to suppress a peasant uprising.

description.zh-cn: 明朝正统年间爆发于广东地区的农民起义。
description.en: A peasant uprising that broke out in the Guangdong region during the Zhengtong era of the Ming dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 清朝咸丰年间太平军将领，曾在佛山建立根据地。
description.en: A general of the Taiping Army during the Xianfeng era of the Qing dynasty, who established a base in Foshan.

description.zh-cn: 清朝后期的一次大规模反清运动中建立的政权。
description.en: A regime established during a large-scale anti-Qing movement in the late Qing dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 清朝官员，曾任两广总督，其部下击败了李文茂领导的太平军。
description.en: A Qing dynasty official who served as the Viceroy of Liangguang. His subordinates defeated the Taiping Army led by Li Wenmao.

description.zh-cn: 广东省省会，与佛山市相邻，两市共同构成“广佛都市圈”。
description.en: The capital of Guangdong Province, adjacent to Foshan. The two cities form the 'Guangzhou-Foshan metropolitan area'.

description.zh-cn: 总部位于佛山顺德的中国跨国科技集团和家电制造商。
description.en: A Chinese multinational technology group and home appliance manufacturer headquartered in Shunde, Foshan.

description.zh-cn: 总部位于佛山顺德的中国房地产开发公司。
description.en: A Chinese real estate development company headquartered in Shunde, Foshan.

description.zh-cn: 总部位于佛山的中国调味品生产和销售公司。
description.en: A Chinese condiment production and sales company headquartered in Foshan.

description.zh-cn: 中国晚清时期的政治家、思想家、教育家，其故居位于佛山市南海区，是全国重点文物保护单位。
description.en: A Chinese statesman, thinker, and educator of the late Qing dynasty. His former residence, located in Nanhai District, Foshan, is a national key cultural relics protection unit.

description.en: Bai Tao has served as the Mayor of the Foshan Municipal People's Government since October 2021.

description.zh-cn: 李政华自2022年1月起担任中国人民政治协商会议佛山市委员会主席。
description.en: Li Zhenghua has served as the Chairman of the Foshan Municipal Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference since January 2022.

description.zh-cn: 唐屹峰接替郑轲担任佛山市委书记职务。
description.en: Tang Yifeng succeeded Zheng Ke as the Secretary of the Foshan Municipal Party Committee.

description.zh-cn: 于东晋隆安二年（398年）来到季华乡（今佛山），修建佛寺，传播佛教。
description.en: In 398 AD, during the Long'an era of the Eastern Jin dynasty, he came to Jihua Township (present-day Foshan), built a Buddhist temple, and spread Buddhism.

description.zh-cn: 达毗耶舍在季华乡修建佛寺传播佛教，为该地后来被命名为“佛山”（意为佛家之山）奠定了文化基础。
description.en: Dabhiyeśa built a temple and spread Buddhism in Jihua Township, laying the cultural foundation for the place to be later named 'Foshan' (meaning Buddha's Mountain).

description.zh-cn: 于明朝正统十四年（1449年）组织地方武装“忠义营”参与镇压黄萧养农民起义。
description.en: In 1449, during the Zhengtong era of the Ming dynasty, he organized a local armed force called the 'Zhongyi Camp' to participate in the suppression of the Huang Xiaoyang Peasant Uprising.

description.zh-cn: 李文茂是太平军将领，以佛山为基地发动起义响应太平天国运动。
description.en: Li Wenmao was a Taiping Army general who launched an uprising based in Foshan in response to the Taiping Heavenly Kingdom movement.

description.zh-cn: 清咸丰年间，叶名琛的部下击败了围攻广州的李文茂部队。
description.en: During the Xianfeng era of the Qing dynasty, Ye Mingchen's subordinates defeated Li Wenmao's troops that were besieging Guangzhou.
